snippet.title: [FREE] Pokemon: Ash's Room VR - Overview
snippet.description:
Download for Free: https://gumroad.com/l/RExH

This is a fan made Project and has no ties to Nintendo or the Pokemon Company. I made this because I love the Pokemon series and wanted to make something that would pay tribute and put a smile on the face of other fans.

I designed it for the HTC Vive and that's what I also tested it on but I also went ahead and mapped the Oculus Touch key as well. Since I do not have an Oculus Touch I can't 100% guarantee that it will work as intended. I've had a few people test it out on theirs and said it was playable. 

Feel free to reach out and tell me what you guys think via twitter @JarlanPerez

I'll be releasing it on Tuesday, February 21st via Gumroad for Free! I'll be uploading the description here with a download link then.
